quizDescription: Test your knowledge of classic oldies movies with this nostalgic trivia quiz!

questions.question: In the classic film 'Gone with the Wind,' who plays the role of Scarlett O'Hara?
questions.explanation: In 'Gone with the Wind,' Vivien Leigh portrays the iconic role of Scarlett O'Hara.

questions.question: Which classic movie stars Marilyn Monroe as a young woman who becomes the center of attention in a small town?
questions.explanation: In 'The Seven Year Itch,' Marilyn Monroe plays a young woman who becomes the center of attention in a small town.

questions.question: Which classic movie follows the story of a newspaper tycoon's rise to power and his eventual downfall?
questions.explanation: The classic movie 'Citizen Kane' follows the story of a newspaper tycoon's rise to power and his eventual downfall.

questions.question: What is the name of the spaceship in the sci-fi movie '2001: A Space Odyssey'?
questions.explanation: In '2001: A Space Odyssey,' the name of the spaceship is Discovery One.

questions.question: In the classic movie 'Casablanca,' what is the famous line spoken by Humphrey Bogart's character?
options: Of all the gin joints in all the towns in all the world, she walks into mine.
questions.explanation: In 'Casablanca,' Humphrey Bogart's character says the famous line, 'Here's looking at you, kid.'

questions.question: Which classic movie stars Audrey Hepburn as a young New York socialite with a passion for high fashion?
questions.explanation: In 'Breakfast at Tiffany's,' Audrey Hepburn portrays a young New York socialite with a passion for high fashion.

questions.question: Which classic movie features a group of Allied prisoners attempting to escape from a German POW camp during World War II?
questions.explanation: The classic movie 'The Great Escape' features a group of Allied prisoners attempting to escape from a German POW camp during World War II.

questions.question: In the classic film 'Roman Holiday,' which actress plays the role of Princess Ann?
questions.explanation: In 'Roman Holiday,' Audrey Hepburn plays the role of Princess Ann.

questions.question: Which classic movie follows the story of a man who gets a chance to see what life would have been like if he had never been born?
questions.explanation: The classic movie 'It's a Wonderful Life' follows the story of a man who gets a chance to see what life would have been like if he had never been born.

questions.question: What is the name of the iconic character played by Marlon Brando in the classic film 'The Godfather'?
questions.explanation: In 'The Godfather,' Marlon Brando plays the iconic character Don Vito Corleone.

questions.question: Which classic movie follows the story of a lawyer defending a black man accused of raping a white woman?
questions.explanation: The classic movie 'To Kill a Mockingbird' follows the story of a lawyer defending a black man accused of raping a white woman.

questions.question: What is the name of the fictional African country in the classic movie 'Coming to America'?
questions.explanation: The fictional African country in the classic movie 'Coming to America' is called Zamunda.

questions.question: Which classic movie features a man who is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean?
questions.explanation: The classic movie 'Back to the Future' features a man who is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.

questions.question: In the classic movie 'Breakfast at Tiffany's,' what is the name of the character played by George Peppard?
questions.explanation: In 'Breakfast at Tiffany's,' George Peppard plays the character named Paul Varjak.

questions.question: Which classic movie follows the story of a man who is wrongly accused of murdering his wife and must prove his innocence?
questions.explanation: The classic movie 'The Fugitive' follows the story of a man who is wrongly accused of murdering his wife and must prove his innocence.
